about_the_game:
Wake up in a mysterious single-family home—a place that feels both eerily nostalgic, like a childhood friend’s house from long ago, and oppressively unsettling. That’s where this game begins.

Begin Your Exploration

Strange items are scattered at your feet and around the room, incongruous with their surroundings yet vital to uncovering the story. In this game, collecting items isn’t your only goal—you must consume them and “vomit blood” as a key mechanic.

By consuming items and absorbing their essence, you gradually gain abilities that bring you closer to the truth, even as your strength wanes. In this game, your HP gauge is not directly tied to survival or clearing the game. It carries an entirely different significance.

Run From the Encroaching Shadows

When you consume items and “bleed”, a certain presence is drawn to the scent of your blood. If this presence catches you, it’s an immediate Game Over—so be vigilant. Skillfully lure it away, conceal yourself, and continue your cycle of consuming items and vomiting blood to become the player this story demands.

A World You Can Truly Step Into

This is a VR horror game, allowing you to play as though you’ve stepped right into a film. Using VR controllers, you can open shelves and refrigerators or push against walls to fully immerse yourself in this strange house. Two movement options are available:

  • Smooth Locomotion using the joystick for deeper immersion.

  • Teleportation for those who prefer to reduce motion sickness.

Choose your movement style and plunge into a disturbing yet nostalgic world unlike any other.

content_descriptors.notes: It includes a scene in which a foreign object is swallowed and blood is vomited.

name: MUSE / ミューズ
short_description: The story begins in a mysterious house. Strange items scattered about are key to uncovering the truth. You must ingest them and “vomit blood,” gaining powers at the cost of your health. But beware: the scent of your blood draws a lurking threat that ends the game if it catches you.
